title: FS:  Three Nice Exhibits Dimaggio/Paige/J. Robinson
author: Snapolit1

posts.post_title: FS:  Three Nice Exhibits Dimaggio/Paige/J. Robinson
posts.post_content:
1939-46 Exhibits Joe DiMaggio SGC 60 $125

1947-68 Exhibits Satchel Paige PSA 6  $200

1947-66 Exhibits Jackie Robinson SGC 82  $65

All three to same buyer for $370.  Thanks.
One and only bump.  Otherwise back into the safe.
